name: Dice Arithmetics
description:
DISCLAIMER: there is a bug on level 4. The dice need to add up to 2. If they add up to 12 it doesn't work. Oops!

Submission for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam. The theme was Roll of the Dice.

To play, you can move the white dice  by rolling with arrow keys or WASD. The goal of the game is to defeat all the enemy dice by following the restriction shown above and being on the next tile of a dice. 

The game has a randomness aspect to it, but you can predict movement using Spacebar to see the different hidden faces of each dice. You can switch between prediction mode and dissasembly mode for the view of the dice with Z / M. 

There is 6 levels with increasing difficulty. Good luck!

The source code can be found here.
